snippet.title: Peacemaker: Bloody Emperor, a Dark Fantasy JRPG, Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2548910/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/i_khaos
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/SoundingStoneIndieGame

A dark fantasy JRPG. The imperial princess Chrysoberyl must fight the Bloody Emperor who has usurped the throne. However, her army is small and her allies are conniving. It is a bloody war where she will have to choose between PEACE and LIVES...
